title: Looking for 5s team that plays too much
body: trying again... looking to grind the 5s ladder and improve as a group :)

replies.body:
hey i just created a team and im looking for some other team captains to start scrimming with. my team is new and would benefit from playing regularly together outside ranked games just for practice. add me if you want to 5v5 scrim.
span
u can join mine if u want im trying to play in a ranked 5s team for team rewards if u dont mind what rank people u play with
